attributes.action: Stop high car insurance premiums because of area codes in M6/M7
attributes.additional_details: Premiums on car insurance is going higher and higher because of postcodes. Especially in M6/M7 area. This needs to be stopped as we are now down on our money and spending more to insure cars. Individual circumstances should be taken in to consideration instead, such as no claims bonus'

rejection.details: This is a matter for the insurance industry.
